tag_list: boston, entrepreneur, angel, investor, wealth, management, business, startup, advisor, consultant
overview:
Jonah is a serial entrepreneur, startup advisor, angel investor, business consultant, wealth manager, social media lover, cause-marketing innovator, social impact believer, corporate responsibility advocate, improving blogger and aspiring philanthropist.

Jonah is the Founder and/or Investor at InterCapital Group LLC, CauseBright, Boston Impact & Innovation, Startup Masters, Endeavor Card, Alumni Battle, Parabolic Ventures, Apex Wealth Consultants, NextGen Leaders Council, Inspired Apparel Company, Intern Genie, Fraud Collect, Fans Duel, Alliance of Professional Advisors and Inspired Futures Foundation. He is also an advisor at 10+ startup companies from a variety of sectors and industries.

Jonah currently sits on the Board of Directors at Partners for Youth with Disabilities and is a Connector for Boston World Partnerships. For the past several years, he has been active with the MIT Enterprise Forum, Association for Corporate Growth, Boston Estate Planning Council and the Boston Philanthropic Advisory Roundtable. He’s also been involved with The Boston Foundation, United Way Emerging Leaders, Downtown Boston Rotary Club, Luncheon Club of Boston, Social Good 2.0, Mass Challenge and Greater Boston Estate Planning Professionals. Jonah has hosted dozens of business conferences, fundraising events, cocktail parties, entrepreneur roundtables and social gatherings throughout the Boston area. He’s also an active speaker & blogger on social entrepreneurship, corporate responsibility, charitable giving and impact investing.
